title: Maths
content: Is it enough if I just work out all the cw problems?? I mean in isa some questions just came straight from the cw but will it be the same case for esa? Or is extra reference required?

comments.body: For us they asked both ESAs almost fully ditto from cw

See some of the typical questions in question bank, assignment also

In CSE and CSE AI-ML, is there rote learning involved in  anyway in PESU? Like, do they ask for stuff which you would need to memorise as opposed to understanding? I'm scared coz I don't really like memorising stuff compared to understanding it.
Yes there are many subjects in cse that require large amounts of memorization. Idk abt ai/ml
Really? So not based on understanding but memorization! That is crazy! Is it just PESU that has this issue or every college has it?
U can understand things too but certain have so much theory that I u have no choice but to memorize. Every college has this issue
But dw it's pretty manageable if u study beforehand. Don't wait for the day before exams
Alright, got it. Thank you for replying.

CS is not just programming, there is a *lot* more to CS. Coding is just a means to apply these concepts. So yes, you'll find that some courses will be math heavy, some will be entirely theoretical, some are applied, etc.
